channel.title: Yarrak griefed
channel.description: Yarrak griefed at my house. My house is in Fuscate's island and he take some torches from there too. I want him to get banned! :mad:

item.title: Yarrak griefed
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Make a report providing evidence of what you’re saying. You can collect evidence by using /hawk tool and taking screenshots of the appropriate blocks, and then posting them in the thread in this section:

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/board,179.0.html

We have these sections for a reason.

Read full topic
